heroTitle: Automate your customer service and sales areas, with AI agents that act as your best employee.
heroSubtitle: BircleAI provides 24/7 answers to your customer's queries, increasing sales, retaining them and increasing their satisfaction.
featuresSubtitle: We present to you an end-to-end solution that automates your company's communication. Our tools allow you to gain more clients and lower churn.
featureOneSubtitle: Leave your customers in good hands. Train your chatbot to behave exactly as your best employee would, 24/7.
featureTwoSubtitle: The agent can answer your clients questions through your web page, instagram, facebook and whatsapp.
featureThreeTitle: 10 times cheaper than a call center
featureThreeSubtitle: The agent is 10 times cheaper than a call center or having an in-house customer support/sales area.
featureFourTitle: Integrable with a simple line of code
featureFourSubtitle: Integrate our agent into your company with a single line of code, in no more than 10 minutes.
modelTitle: Train the model to be your best employee
modelOneSubtitle: The agent learns and adapts to your organizational culture.
modelTwoTitle: Train him to become your best employee
modelTwoSubtitle: Correct the responses generated by the agent and it will instantly learn from your feedback.
modelThreeTitle: Always keep your data up to date
modelThreeSubtitle: We keep data synchronized and always updated.
modelFourSubtitle: BircleAI offers private and confidential Agents.
manageAllCommunicationsTitle: Manage all communications with your clients automatically
manageAllCommunicationsSubtitle: An artificial intelligence agent that facilitates customer communication for companies that market, sell and provide support through instant messaging and online chat.
pricingOneSubtitle: Excellent for starting to automate your communication with your customers.
pricingTwoSubtitle: Designed for teams that require advanced solutions tailored to their needs and requirements.
reviewsTitle: Everyone is changing their business with BircleAI.
reviewsSubtitle: Dont take our word for it.
reviewOneBody: I started using this product, and within a week, our customer interactions have become much more efficient. The chatbots behave like humans, and our customers are delighted.
reviewTwoBody: Our company has been using this tool to automate customer service, and it's made a significant difference. Now, we can serve more customers effectively and provide quick, accurate responses.
reviewThreeBody: Implementing this product has allowed us to automate many customer interactions, freeing up time for our teams to focus on more strategic tasks. Additionally, we're seeing significant cost savings.
reviewFourBody: Since we incorporated this solution into our marketing strategy, we've seen a noticeable increase in our conversions. The chatbots provide precise and personalized responses, which our customers appreciate.
reviewFiveBody: This product has transformed the way we interact with customers. The chatbots have improved our customer service and are helping to boost our sales. Highly recommended!
reviewSixBody: I can't believe how effective the chatbots in this product are. They have streamlined our customer communication, and we're seeing tangible results in terms of customer satisfaction and operational efficiency.
reviewSevenBody: As a sales representative, this tool has been a blessing. The chatbots help me qualify leads and provide quick responses, leading to higher conversion rates.
reviewEightBody: This product has greatly improved the customer experience in our company. The chatbots deliver instant and accurate responses, resulting in higher customer satisfaction.
